name: MotoX
description:
MotoX is an immersive motocross/motorcycle racing game where players can experience the speed, danger, and adrenaline of a virtual Motocross experience. Ride through 7 unique worlds that you can explore on your own in time trails.

(MotoX is currently under development and testing for oculus quest and quest 2.)

key Features

Explore Unique and Interesting Environments
High-speed Racing Against Opponents
Clear Death-defying Stunts
Dodge Obstacles
Unique Music themed For Each Location
Collect Coins to Unlock New Bikes
Progress Through New and Exciting Worlds
Comfort Controls

Coming Soon

New Driving Mechanics
New Worlds and Levels
Character customization
Leaderboards
Target Shooting
